attributes.action: Those who purposely endanger or kill an animal should be jailed for a min if 10 years with no recourse to public funds after
attributes.additional_details:
Those who purposely endanger or kill animals should be imprisoned for life.

Who in Their right mind would bring pain or cruelty onto a vulnerable animal.
They have no voice and cannot speak so we need to speak up for them.
We should have the right to prosecute anyone who wilfully endangers our pets.
I call on the government to intervene and animals and send the excuse of people who endanger kill or breed these animals for one purpose only. Not enough is done to protect them. They should be jailed with no recourse to public funds after. I'm paying for them
To have lawyers, be jailed
And then pay for them after, what a Cushty life. JAIL THEM PENALISE THEM AND DON'T SUPPORT THEM!!!!!
